Can someone help me configure my resolut: I missed your question... could you repeat it please?
I want a 1280x1024 resolution, (which my monitor and card support - I've done it in Windows), and I configured my Xorg.conf to be able to have that resolution, but all I can go up to is 1280x800.
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg.  go through that command, choose 'advanced' at the end, and pick the 1280x1024 res.
at the end, nothing will happen, it'll just exit.  restart gdm (ctrl-alt-backspace) and you should be good.
if X fails to start, use that command again, and set it to something lower.  we'll get you fixed yet :)
